description: "Difficulty in Identifying Knowledge Gaps among Students."
"Discussion on key challenges in education including student engagement, lack of real-time feedback, ineffective lesson improvements, and the need for actionable insights."

"Solution overview involving multi-modal data collection, real-time speech analysis, slide monitoring, integration and analysis of data for comprehensive student engagement, and providing actionable feedback to teachers."
"Highlighting the benefits of a tool including real-time insights, data-driven improvements, and ease of use."
